member.name: T:MsiReader.MsiReader
member.summary: Class to query some property from a MSI file.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor with specified FilePath

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetProductCode
member.summary: Return the Product Code of the MSI file.
member.param: The full path + fileName of the MSI file.
member.returns: The Product Code of the MSI. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetProductName
member.summary: Return the Name of the Product of the MSI file.
member.param: The full path + fileName of the MSI file.
member.returns: The Name of the Product of the MSI. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetManufacturer
member.summary: Return the name of the Manufacturer of the MSI file.
member.param: The full path + fileName of the MSI file.
member.returns: The name of the Manufacturer of the MSI. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetProductVersion
member.summary: Return the Version of the product of the MSI file.
member.param: The full path + fileName of the MSI file.
member.returns: The Version of the product of the MSI. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetUpgradeCode
member.summary: Return the UpgradeCode of the Product of the MSI file.
member.param: The full path + fileName of the MSI file.
member.returns: The UpgradeCode of the Product of the MSI. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetPersonnalizeMSIProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Return the value for the personnalize property.
member.param: Name of the property to query.
member.returns: Value of the property. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetAllMSIProperties
member.summary: Query the requested MSI file and return all properties with their value.
member.returns: Return a Dictionnary with property name as key and property value as value.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetXMLDataFromMSPFile
member.summary: Get the XML Data from the MSP file.
member.returns: Return a string with the XML Data.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetAllMSITables
member.summary: Return the list of all Table in this MSI file.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.GetAllMSIValueFromTable(MsiReader.Table)
member.summary: Query the requested Table from the MSI file and return all properties with their value.
member.param: Name of the MSI Table to query.
member.returns: Return a Dictionnary with property name as key and property value as value.

member.name: M:MsiReader.MsiReader.QueryMSIFile(System.String)
member.summary: Query the MSI file for the requested property.
member.param: Name of the Property to query.
member.returns: Return a string which contain the result of the query. If an error occur, return an empty string.

member.name: P:MsiReader.MsiReader.MsiFilePath
member.summary: Get or Set the path to the MSI File to query.

member.name: P:MsiReader.MsiReader.MspFilePath
member.summary: Get or Set the path to the MSP File to query.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Name
member.summary: Get or Set the Name of this Column.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Nullable
member.summary: Identifies whether the column may contain a Null value. This column may have one of the following values : Y : Yes, the column may have a Null value. N : No, the column may not have a Null value.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.MinValue
member.summary: This field applies to columns having numeric value. The field contains the minimum permissible value. This can be the minimum value for an integer or the minimum value for a date or version string.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.MaxValue
member.summary: This field applies to columns having numeric value. The field is the maximum permissible value. This may be the maximum value for an integer or the maximum value for a date or version string.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.KeyTable
member.summary: This field applies to columns that are external keys. The field identified in Column must link to the column number specified by KeyColumn in the table named in KeyTable. This can be a list of tables separated by semicolons.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.KeyColumn
member.summary: This field applies to table columns that are external keys. The field identified in Column must link to the column number specified by KeyColumn in the table named in KeyTable. The permissible range of the KeyColumn field is 1-32.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Category
member.summary: This is the type of data contained by the database field specified by the Table and Column columns of the _Validation table. If this is a type having a numeric value, such as Integer, DoubleInteger or Time/Date, then enter null into this field and specify the value's range using the MinValue and MaxValue columns. Use the Category column to specify the non-numeric data types described in Column Data Types.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Set
member.summary: This is a list of permissible values for this field separated by semicolons. This field is usually used for enumerations.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Description
member.summary: A description of the data that is stored in the column.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Order
member.summary: The order of the column within the table.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Column.Values
member.summary: List of values contains in this Columns. This Property is fill by the 'GetAllMSIValueFromTable' method of the MsiReader Class.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Table.Name
member.summary: Get or Set the name of this Table.

member.name: P:MsiReader.Table.Columns
member.summary: Get the list of all Columns in this table.
